string.name: help_title_
string.orig: Please read the following to understand the concept of logs, plans and rules:

resources.string: Prečítajte si prosím následujúcu nápovedu pre pochopenie konceptu záznamov, plánov a pravidiel:

string.name: help_import_
string.orig: A good starting point are some preconfigured rule sets available on the website. Just import them via import menu and play around.

resources.string: Dobré je začať s nejakými preddefinovanými pravidlami z domovskej stránky. Jednoducho ich naimportujte cez import menu a upravte.

string.name: help_rules_detail1_
string.orig: But keep in mind, that order is important for rules:

resources.string: Ale pamätajte si, že pri pravidlách je dôležité poradie:

string.name: help_export_
string.orig: If you managed to set up a common plan for your country, do not hesitate to export your rule set to me by mail. I will put it on the website to make it available for all the users.

resources.string: Thanks for your publication. I would like to oinpion that the first thing you will need to complete is check if you really need credit score improvement. To do that you have got to get your hands on a replica of your credit rating. That should never be difficult, ever since the government makes it necessary that you are allowed to obtain one no cost copy of your credit report each year. You just have to check with the right folks. You can either find out from the website owned by the Federal Trade Commission or maybe contact one of the major credit agencies directly.
